name: Arcane Whisper
text_description: Arcane Whisper's mystical energies may seem weak, but its power lies in subtlety and deception. When deployed, Arcane Whisper can swap its Attack and Defense stats with those of any other Arcane type card in play, once.
illustration_description: A subtle, ethereal wisp of arcane magic floating amidst ancient, mystical runes. The wisp is casting a warm, mysterious glow that illuminates the surrounding magical symbols.
